ResourceHeader.Description: The Low Energy Particle instrumentation carried on the Akebono spacecraft consists of many components. Ion and electron E/Q analysis is carried out by two quadrispherical electrostatic analyzers (one for ions, one for electrons) each followed by five channeltrons. Energy ranges for measured ions and electrone are 13 eV/Q - 20 keV/Q and 10 ev - 16 keV, respectively, with good spectral resolution in these ranges. Details on the instrument and its operations and data processing is found in Mukai et. al., J. Geomag Geoelect, 42, 479-496, 1990.
